item.title: Tony Orlando - Candida
item.description:
KY: 61210

The stars
won’t come out
If they know that
you’re about
Cause they couldn’t
match the glow
Of your eyes
and oh who am I
Just an ordinary guy
trying hard
To win me first prize
oh Candida
We could make it
together
The further from here
girl the better
Where the air
is fresh and clean
Oh Candida
Just take my hand
And I’ll lead ya
I promise
Life will be sweeter
cause it said so
In my dreams
the future
Looks bright
the gypsy told me so
Last night
said she saw
Our children playing
in the sunshine
And there were
you and I in a house
Baby no lie
and all these things
Were yours
and they were mine
Oh my Candida
we could make it
Together
the further from here
Girl the better
where the air
Is fresh and clean
oh Candida
Just take my hand
and I’ll lead ya
I promise
life will be sweeter
Cause it said so
in my dreams-

And oh who am I
just an ordinary guy
You know I trying hard
to win me first prize
Oh my Candida
we could make it
Together
the further from here
Girl the better
where the air
Is fresh and clean
oh my Candida
Just take my hand
and I’ll lead ya
I promise
life will be sweeter
Cause it said so
in my dreams-
